original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 2117.
    Returns: the total combined time for both friends to run 5 miles each.
    """
    # L1
    first_runner_initial_time = 21 # The first one runs it in 21 minutes
    initial_distance = 3 # racing three miles
    first_runner_pace = first_runner_initial_time / initial_distance

    # L2
    second_runner_initial_time = 24 # The second one runs it in 24 minutes
    second_runner_pace = second_runner_initial_time / initial_distance

    # L3
    target_distance = 5 # run 5 miles each
    first_runner_total_time = target_distance * first_runner_pace

    # L4
    second_runner_total_time = target_distance * second_runner_pace

    # L5
    total_combined_time = first_runner_total_time + second_runner_total_time

    # FA
    answer = total_combined_time
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: The first one runs a mile in {first_runner_pace} minutes because {first_runner_initial_time} / {initial_distance} = <<{first_runner_initial_time}/{initial_distance}={first_runner_pace}>>{first_runner_pace}

The second runs a mile in {second_runner_pace} minutes because {second_runner_initial_time} / {initial_distance} = <<{second_runner_initial_time}/{initial_distance}={second_runner_pace}>>{second_runner_pace}

The first one would finish {target_distance} miles in {first_runner_total_time} minutes because {target_distance} x {first_runner_pace} = <<{target_distance}*{first_runner_pace}={first_runner_total_time}>>{first_runner_total_time}

The second one would finish in {second_runner_total_time} minutes because {target_distance} x {second_runner_pace} = <<{target_distance}*{second_runner_pace}={second_runner_total_time}>>{second_runner_total_time}

It will take {total_combined_time} minutes in total because {first_runner_total_time} + {second_runner_total_time} = <<{first_runner_total_time}+{second_runner_total_time}={total_combined_time}>>{total_combined_time}
